name: Gästehaus Tipotsch
description: Our house is situated on the outskirts of Mayrhofen in the sub district of Neu-Burgstall, in a quiet, sunny position. In summer one can enjoy relaxing walks along the Ziller promenade. In winter the cross country ski trail and ski and village bus stop are only 100 metres away. The Horbergbahn lift station is 500 metres away. Our holiday apartments are comfortably furnished, and equipped with radio, colour TV, coffee machine, electric oven and dish washer. Bed linen, tea and hand towels are provided. Bread delivery service available.

Included in price: Local taxes, heating, electricity, water and television. 
Excludes: Final cleaning charge costing between 22 and 30 Euros.

Check in 14.00hr, check out 10.00hr.
How to find us: Take the motorway turn off at Wiesing, in heading towards Zillertal, through the Brettfall tunnel, along the B169 until Kaltenbach and then towards Zell am Ziller/Mayrhofen. Straight on until the Christophorus Reisen offices and bus garages on the right, then right over the bridge in the direction of the Horbergbahn, left at the roundabout, past the Sidan Pizzeria, and after approx. 500m you will be in Neu Burgstall and our house can be found 50 metres on the left.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The apartment is approx. 70m² with 2 double rooms and 1 single room with sofa bed. All rooms equipped with shower, WC, balcony.  Entrance hall and fully equipped lounge/kitchen.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description: The apartment is 40m² large, with a double room, shower/WC, fully equipped lounge/kitchen, entrance hall and balcony. The aparmtent is suitable for maximum 3 persons or 2 adults and 2 children. Price per person and day, 45 Euro.
